title: Gabriel 70027 Ultra Shock, 1 Pack
features: Precision Engineered for today's light trucks with G-Force technology for safety and performance; Gabriel Ultra provides comfort and control, long life, durability and maximum shock performance
Infinitely Variable Damping for all road conditions
Orifice Control Disc for consistent control comfort and stability and an OE-design single lip oil seal that minimizes friction for optimal comfort and performance
Super-finished chromed piston rod provides superior corrosion resistance, enhances sealing properties, ensures proper seal lubrication and provides a more consistent wear surface
Leak-proof piston seal which extends product life
description: Precision-engineered for the ultimate in safety and performance, Ultra shock absorbers by Gabriel provide improved comfort and control, long life and durability, and maximum shock performance for today's passenger cars. Ultra shocks are equipped with G-Force technology featuring Infinitely Variable Damping for on-demand control on all road conditions. And like all Gabriel shocks and struts, Ultra shocks feature a super-finished chromed piston rod for superior corrosion resistance and a leak-proof piston seal which extends product life.
